description: This file defines a React functional component named OnboardingForm that provides a user interface for collecting minimal user information to initiate a KYC (Know Your Customer) process. It manages form state, handles form submission asynchronously, and communicates with an external kycService to start the KYC process.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Handles input change events to update the form state.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Handles form submission, initiates the start of KYC process via kycService, and manages loading/error states.
